text: Nandao shi dadi chengwei anju zhi suo, shi zhu heliu xiang qijian, zai qizhong wengu de anzhi qun shan, bing zai liang hai [xian hai yu danhai] zhi jian shezhi yige [yinxing] pingzhang de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Bu, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
